name: Marvel Portal
desc: «Marvel Library» allows you to find the character or book you need with all the details.
brief: A small library on the Marvel Universe

name: Food
desc: Proper nutrition is necessary for everyone, this website will tell you about it. You can calculate the calorie intake for yourself, as well as order something to eat.

name: Game of Thrones DB
desc: Large and mysterious universe of the Game of Thrones. This SPA will help you better deal with characters, books, buildings.

name: RunSmart
desc: On this site you have the opportunity to choose a sports watch for yourself. A large catalog and customer reviews will help you make the right choice.

name: Uber
desc: The Uber taxi website allows the client to find out about the company, why it is worth choosing it, and also to get a job as a taxi driver.
brief: Training project for the Uber website

name: Data Groop
desc: My personal project that allows students to search for a person with the same variant. This saves time by doing homework together.

name: Checkers
desc: This well known game will make you really use your brains.

name: Irvas-Windows
desc: The Irvas company is engaged in a glazing of balconies and apartments. On her website, you can choose a glazing option for your home and place an order.

name: TPU Cafe
desc: Students often learn about new places from the Internet. Tomsk Polytechnic University opened its cafe especially for students. On this site, they can get acquainted with the menu, learn about discounts and place an order.
brief: Cafe website of Tomsk Polytechnic University (course project)

name: Wordpress
desc: This simple and small site opened my way to the big and interesting world of web programming.
